label: A2B_mP12_14_2e_e-011
title: Acanthite (Ag$_{2}$S) Structure
comments:
(Frueh, 1958) gave the structure in the $P2_1/n$ setting of space group \#14.  We used FINDSYM to transform this into the standard $P2_1/c$ setting. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP12_14_2e_e-011}{Acanthite (Ag$_{2}$S)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP12_14_2e_e-001}{baddeleyite (ZrO$_{2}$, $C43$)}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP12_14_2e_e-012}{NdAs$_{2}$} all have the same AFLOW prototype label, A2B\_mP12\_14\_2e\_e.  They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
